tool_description: Regulate access and log usage of Dropbox Business account.
name: DropboxBusiness
title: DropboxBusiness

api_list.name: addGroupMember
api_list.description: Adds member to a group.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Type of user id. Possible values: team_member_id, external_id, email.

required_parameters.name: accessType
required_parameters.description: Access type. Possible values: member, owner.

api_list.name: addTeamMember
api_list.description: Adds members to a team.

optional_parameters.name: memberPersistentId
optional_parameters.description: Persistent ID for member. This field is only available to teams using persistent ID SAML configuration.

optional_parameters.name: memberSurname
optional_parameters.description: Member's last name.

optional_parameters.name: memberRole
optional_parameters.description: Describes which team-related admin permissions a user has. Possible values: member_only(default), support_admin, user_management_admin, team_admin

optional_parameters.name: sendWelcomeEmail
optional_parameters.description: Whether to send a welcome email to the member. If send_welcome_email is false, no email invitation will be sent to the user. This may be useful for apps using single sign-on (SSO) flows for onboarding that want to handle announcements themselves. The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: forceAsync
optional_parameters.description: Whether to force the add to happen asynchronously. The default for this field is False.

optional_parameters.name: memberGivenName
optional_parameters.description: Member's first name.

optional_parameters.name: memberExternalId
optional_parameters.description: External ID for member.

api_list.name: archiveTeamFolder
api_list.description: Sets an active team folder's status to archived and removes all folder and file members.

required_parameters.name: teamFolderId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the team folder.

optional_parameters.name: forceAsyncOff
optional_parameters.description: Whether to force the archive to happen synchronously. The default for this field is False.

api_list.name: checkAddTeamMemberStatus
api_list.description: Use this to poll the status of the asynchronous request of addTeamMember.

api_list.name: checkArchiveFolderStatus
api_list.description: Returns the status of an asynchronous job for archiving a team folder.

api_list.name: checkRemoveTeamMemberStatus
api_list.description: Use this to poll the status of the asynchronous request.

api_list.name: createGroup
api_list.description: Creates a new, empty group, with a requested name.

optional_parameters.name: groupManagementType
optional_parameters.description: Whether the team can be managed by selected users, or only by team admins. Possible values: user_managed, company_managed, system_managed.

optional_parameters.name: groupExternalId
optional_parameters.description: The creator of a team can associate an arbitrary external ID to the group.

api_list.name: createTeamFolder
api_list.description: Creates a new, active, team folder.

api_list.name: deleteArchivedFolder
api_list.description: Permanently deletes an archived team folder.

required_parameters.name: teamFolderId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the team folder.

api_list.name: deleteGroup
api_list.description: Deletes a group. The group is deleted immediately. However the revoking of group-owned resources may take additional time.

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: Generates user access token

required_parameters.name: redirectUri
required_parameters.description: Redirect uri set for your app

api_list.name: getAuthenticatedAdmin
api_list.description: Returns the member profile of the admin who generated the team access token used to make the call.

api_list.name: getGroupJobStatus
api_list.description: Retrieves information about status of any of group job

required_parameters.name: groupJobId
required_parameters.description: Id of the asynchronous job. This is the value of a response returned from the method that launched the job

api_list.name: getGroupMembers
api_list.description: Lists members of a group.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per call. The default for this field is 1000.

api_list.name: getGroups
api_list.description: Retrieves information about several groups

api_list.name: getMembersDevices
api_list.description: List all device sessions of a team's member.

optional_parameters.name: includeDesktopClients
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list linked desktop devices of the team's member The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: At the first call to the getMembersDevices the cursor shouldn't be passed. Then, if the result of the call includes a cursor, the following requests should include the received cursors in order to receive the next sub list of team devices

optional_parameters.name: includeWebSessions
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list web sessions of the team's member The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: includeMobileClients
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list linked mobile devices of the team's member The default for this field is True.

api_list.name: getMembersLinkedApps
api_list.description: List all applications linked to the team members' accounts.

optional_parameters.name: cursors
optional_parameters.description: If the result of the call includes a cursor, the following requests should include the received cursors in order to receive the next sub list of the team applications

api_list.name: getSingleGroup
api_list.description: Retrieves information about one group

api_list.name: getSingleMemberDevices
api_list.description: List all device sessions of a team's member.

optional_parameters.name: includeDesktopClients
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list linked desktop devices of the team's member The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: includeWebSessions
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list web sessions of the team's member The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: includeMobileClients
optional_parameters.description: Whether to list linked mobile devices of the team's member The default for this field is True.

api_list.name: getSingleMemberLinkedApps
api_list.description: List all linked applications of the team member.

api_list.name: getSingleTeamMemberInfo
api_list.description: Returns information about single team member.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

api_list.name: getTeam
api_list.description: Retrieves information about a team.

api_list.name: getTeamFolders
api_list.description: Lists all team folders.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per request. The default for this field is 1000.

api_list.name: getTeamFoldersMetadata
api_list.description: Retrieves metadata for team folders.

required_parameters.name: teamFolderIds
required_parameters.description: The list of team folder IDs.

api_list.name: getTeamGroups
api_list.description: Lists groups on a team.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per call. The default for this field is 1000.

api_list.name: getTeamLinkedDevicesReport
api_list.description: Retrieves reporting data about a team's linked devices.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional ending date (exclusive)

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional starting date (inclusive)

api_list.name: getTeamMembers
api_list.description: Lists members of a team.

optional_parameters.name: includeRemoved
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return removed members. The default for this field is False.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per call. The default for this field is 1000.

api_list.name: getTeamMembersInfo
api_list.description: Returns information about multiple team members.

api_list.name: getTeamMembershipReport
api_list.description: Retrieves reporting data about a team's membership.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional ending date (exclusive)

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional starting date (inclusive)

api_list.name: getTeamStorageUsageReport
api_list.description: Retrieves reporting data about a team's storage usage.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional ending date (exclusive)

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional starting date (inclusive)

api_list.name: getTeamUsersActivityReport
api_list.description: Retrieves reporting data about a team's user activity.

optional_parameters.name: endDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional ending date (exclusive)

optional_parameters.name: startDate
optional_parameters.description: Timestamp(format="%Y-%m-%d")? Optional starting date (inclusive)

api_list.name: paginateGroupMembers
api_list.description: Use this to paginate through all members of the group.

required_parameters.name: cursor
required_parameters.description: Indicates from what point to get the next set of groups.

api_list.name: paginateTeamGroups
api_list.description: Use this to paginate through all groups.

required_parameters.name: cursor
required_parameters.description: Indicates from what point to get the next set of groups.

api_list.name: paginateTeamMembers
api_list.description: Use this to paginate through all team members.

required_parameters.name: cursor
required_parameters.description: Indicates from what point to get the next set of members.

api_list.name: permanentlyDelete
api_list.description: Permanently delete the file or folder at a given path

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: Path in the user's Dropbox to delete.

api_list.name: recoverDeletedMember
api_list.description: Recover a deleted member.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

api_list.name: removeGroupMembers
api_list.description: Removes members from a group..

required_parameters.name: users
required_parameters.description: List of users to be removed from the group. Example [{".tag" : "email", "email" : "justin@emaple.com" }]

optional_parameters.name: returnMembers
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return the list of members in the group. Note that the default value will cause all the group members to be returned in the response. This may take a long time for large groups. The default for this field is True.

api_list.name: removeTeamMember
api_list.description: Removes a member from a team.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

optional_parameters.name: destinationMemberId
optional_parameters.description: If provided, files from the deleted member account will be transferred to this user.

optional_parameters.name: adminMemberId
optional_parameters.description: If provided, errors during the transfer process will be sent via email to this user. If the destinationMemberId argument was provided, then this argument must be provided as well.

optional_parameters.name: keepAccount
optional_parameters.description: Downgrade the member to a Basic account. The user will retain the email address associated with their Dropbox account and data in their account that is not restricted to team members. In order to keep the account the argument wipeData should be set to False. The default for this field is False.

optional_parameters.name: wipeData
optional_parameters.description: If provided, controls if the user's data will be deleted on their linked devices. The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: destinationMemberIdType
optional_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

optional_parameters.name: adminMemberIdType
optional_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

api_list.name: renameTeamFolder
api_list.description: Changes an active team folder's name.

required_parameters.name: teamFolderName
required_parameters.description: The new name of the team folder.

required_parameters.name: teamFolderId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the team folder.

api_list.name: revokeAccessToken
api_list.description: Revokes user access tokens

api_list.name: revokeDevicesSession
api_list.description: Unlink a linked desktop device

required_parameters.name: revokeDevices
required_parameters.description: List of devices. For example: {"web_session" : {"session_id": "123", "team_member_id" : "321"}, "mobile_client" : {"session_id": "123", "team_member_id" : "321"}, "desktop_client" : {"session_id": "123", "team_member_id" : "321", "delete_on_unlink" : true}}

api_list.name: revokeLinkedApps
api_list.description: Revoke linked applications of the team members

api_list.name: revokeSingleDeviceDesktopSession
api_list.description: Unlink a linked desktop device

required_parameters.name: teamMemberId
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the member owning the device

optional_parameters.name: deleteOnUnlink
optional_parameters.description: Whether to delete all files of the account (this is possible only if supported by the desktop client and will be made the next time the client access the account) The default for this field is False.

api_list.name: revokeSingleDeviceMobileSession
api_list.description: Unlink a linked mobile device

required_parameters.name: teamMemberId
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the member owning the device

api_list.name: revokeSingleDeviceWebSession
api_list.description: Revoke a web session of a team's member

required_parameters.name: teamMemberId
required_parameters.description: The unique id of the member owning the device

api_list.name: revokeSingleLinkedApp
api_list.description: Revoke a linked application of the team member

optional_parameters.name: keepAppFolder
optional_parameters.description: Whether to keep the application dedicated folder (in case the application uses one) The default for this field is True.

api_list.name: sendWelcomeEmail
api_list.description: Sends welcome email to pending team member.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

api_list.name: setActiveArchivedFolder
api_list.description: Sets an archived team folder's status to active.

required_parameters.name: teamFolderId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the team folder.

api_list.name: setGroupMemberAccessType
api_list.description: Sets a member's access type in a group.

required_parameters.name: accessType
required_parameters.description: Access type. Possible values: member, owner.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Type of user id. Possible values: team_member_id, external_id, email.

optional_parameters.name: returnMembers
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return the list of members in the group. Note that the default value will cause all the group members to be returned in the response. This may take a long time for large groups. The default for this field is True.

api_list.name: suspendMemberFromTeam
api_list.description: Suspend a member from a team.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

optional_parameters.name: wipeData
optional_parameters.description: If provided, controls if the user's data will be deleted on their linked devices. The default for this field is True.

api_list.name: unsuspendMemberFromTeam
api_list.description: Unsuspend a member from a team.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

api_list.name: updateSingleGroup
api_list.description: Updates a group's name and/or external ID.

optional_parameters.name: newGroupExternalId
optional_parameters.description: New arbitrary external ID to the group.

optional_parameters.name: returnMembers
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return the list of members in the group. Note that the default value will cause all the group members to be returned in the response. This may take a long time for large groups. The default for this field is True.

optional_parameters.name: newGroupName
optional_parameters.description: New group name.

optional_parameters.name: newGroupManagementType
optional_parameters.description: Whether the team can be managed by selected users, or only by team admins. Possible values: user_managed, company_managed, system_managed.

api_list.name: updateTeamMemberPermissions
api_list.description: Updates a team member's permissions.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

required_parameters.name: newRole
required_parameters.description: Describes which team-related admin permissions a user has. Possible values: team_admin, user_management_admin, support_admin, member_only

api_list.name: updateTeamMemberProfile
api_list.description: Updates a team member's profile.

required_parameters.name: memberIdType
required_parameters.description: Argument for selecting a single user, either by team_member_id, external_id or email.

optional_parameters.name: memberGivenName
optional_parameters.description: Member's first name.

optional_parameters.name: memberExternalId
optional_parameters.description: External ID for member.

optional_parameters.name: memberSurname
optional_parameters.description: Member's last name.

optional_parameters.name: memberEmail
optional_parameters.description: Member's email

optional_parameters.name: memberPersistentId
optional_parameters.description: Persistent ID for member. This field is only available to teams using persistent ID SAML configuration.

api_list.name: webhookEvent
api_list.description: This method is called every time a Dropbox Business webhook event occurs
